meanings.sent1: The stereotypers in the movie industry often portray certain groups in a negative light.
meanings.sent2: The stereotypers in society tend to oversimplify complex groups of people.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about stereotypers getting their facts all wrong.
meanings.sent4: Her uncle was a master storyteller, a true stereotyper of family tales.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid picture of the stereotypers at work, shaping perceptions.
